H0.text: Bruno, nephew of which late Formula 1 legend signed to drive for the Williams team. Senna

H1.text: Bruno, nephew of which late Formula 1 legend signed to drive for the Williams team. Fangio

H2.text: Bruno, nephew of which late Formula 1 legend signed to drive for the Williams team. Clark

H3.text: Bruno, nephew of which late Formula 1 legend signed to drive for the Williams team. Silvastone

A4.text: As his uncle had been racing for Williams at the time of his death, Senna first sought out his family's blessing before joining the team.

A5.text: Senna said to the BBC in an interview that he did not want to negotiate with Lotus because of sentimental reasons as his uncle Ayrton Senna took his first win with Team Lotus.
